Cameron is the founder of Aquatic Integration Institute (Aii) and Aquatic Integration, a form of water therapy which combines Eastern meridian and point work with myofascial release, proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation and breath-work and has proven highly effective in a range of clinical settings from psychological and emotional release modalities to traditional rehabilitation of orthopedic trauma and spinal cord injury. She currently specializes in the training of practitioners in Physical and Somatic Therapy practices, in spas and health centers worldwide. Her Aquatic Integration curriculum has been approved for program credit by the Harbin School of Healing Arts at Harbin Hot Springs, Worldwide Aquatic Bodywork Association (WABA) and National Certification Board for Therapeutic Massage & Bodywork (NCBTMB).

story:
Short Summary

As stated in the video we, The Arsenceic Foundation, along with the Critical One Laboratory, have already made significant and vital advances in the fight against cancer and many other life- threatening and debilitating conditions.  With Critical One's PROPRIETARY HYBRIDIZED ADIABATIC FULL SPECTRUM BIOMATRIX EXTRACTION PROCEDURE AND CLINICAL PROTOCOL, we are here to TURN THIS BOAT AROUND!  We are sick and tired of seeing people "sick and tired" and we have developed some amazing ideas to fix this broken healthcare system.

 

 

 

Who are we and how can we do this?

 

Lisa-marie, the director of the Arsenceic Foundation, got tired of feeling empty and unfulfilled after years with several Fortune 500 companies so she left her 401K behind to hold the hands of those who are struggling to survive life- threatening illnesses.  Her years of experience in the corporate world, along with her innate knowledge of botany combined with an obsession of cooking, has enabled her to establish a non-profit foundation dedicated to funding the invention of a line of delicious and nutritious recipes using healing herbs, spices and phytonutrient profiles to aid in natural healing.

As a trained post-graduate Neurobiologist, Marco, the director of research at Critical One Laboratory and the Nutraceutical kitchen, Vita Cucina, has an approach to plant-based extraction protocols, procedures and therapies that are truly unique.  A born researcher, and true Renaissance Man, Marco has sold the shirt off his back to fund a laboratory that is creating groundbreaking, full spectrum biomatrix Nutraceuticals through a proprietary hybridized adiabatic, full spectrum biomatrix extraction procedure and clinical protocols that are changing the way we fight dis-ease and creating healing results that are unparalleled.

With Lisa-marie's business acumen and Marco's unique application of art and science, collectively they are anxious to usher in a new "brand of wellness."

 

Round One!!

  • This 1st  Fundraising Campaign is essential to the growth of Critical One's overall project and facility expansion.  Over the past several years Critical One Laboratory has been funded by the liquidation of personal assets which has provided them with the capital to develop this very important research and proprietary extraction processes and clinical Nutraceutical protocols.   Now, The Arsenceic Foundation, in keeping with its mission statement, has repositioned it's efforts to assist in the funding of this eminent work. It is with your generous donations that The Arsenceic Foundation will be able to continue to assist Critical One with future funding of clinical trials and additional equipment purchases.

     

So check this out....we can make this super simple for you AND improve YOUR health at the same time.    If you were to give up 3 Venti Pumpkin Spice Latte's a week for 2 months you could save yourself 11,280 calories, 1,488 grams of sugar and 360 grams of fat AND you could hand over $126.00 to us so that we can put it to use saving lives.  So...not only are you taking care of your health, but you are helping to purchase equipment that could literally save a life and perhaps...many!   

(And make sure to look very closely at this photo....it will seriously freak you out!)

 

The Critical One Laboratory has already seen tremendous results with its proprietary hybridized adiabatic extraction process and clinical Nutraceutical protocols.  The full spectrum biomatrix extracts have shown increased biovailability and intercellular residency by enhancing secondary and tertiary metabolites unique to this groundbreaking extraction process. Along with Vita Cucina Nutraceutical Kitchen and Production Facility, they're ready to take this to the next level. They desperately need your support to purchase the additional analytical equipment, production equipment, expanded Ultra-Organic Grow facilities and additional personnel. 

This funding is vitally important for all of those who have been dropped by the mainstream medical community and who are struggling with a health issue.  We all deserve to have access to “healthy alternatives to wellness”.  Help us, help you and others!!  Good health isn’t a corporately granted privilege … it’s a birthright!

So what do you say?  Many hands make for light work and The Critical One Laboratory needs your contribution so that they can continue their formal Nutraceutical research into processes, procedures and protocols to determine efficacy, potency and assurance.  With the Holidays upon us there is no better way to show your love for others than making a donation in their name.  Please donate to the Arsenceic Foundation generously. 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

If the Arsenceic Foundation is able to raise all of the badly needed funding, The Critical One Laboratory has an ultimate “wish list”.    However,  in the event that only some of the money is raised, there is a multi-phase plan that will enable Critical One to move forward with the “most pressing items”, putting out the proverbial “fires” in order of importance.

There are some initial "must haves" for the laboratory that are very expensive, but will help with further research and enable the scientists to be more time efficient.  Testing equipment and additional extraction equipment along with scalable production equipment are just a small part of the requisite aparatus required for expansion.

For the Vita Cucina Industrial kitchen and production facility, much of the equipment has already been purchased but as the product line grows, there is a need to increase the scope of the facility.  Additional refrigeration, warmers, blenders and juicers are among some of the additional items required. 

 

In order for the Critical One Laboratory to take the next step forward, acquiring a High Powered Liquid Chromatography or HPLC is mandatory.....this particular piece of equipment is essential when challenging the pharmaceutical industry and showing the nutracokinetic efficacy of this important work. 

Along with additional part time administrative personnel, a full time analytical chemist is a necessary addition to our existing research staff. A fully functioning proprietary website, full of helpful information, articles, recipes and protocols, easily accessed in a library format is also key to truly helping people with life threatening and chronic health conditions.  There is a wonderful Facebook community, numbering in the thousands, that has already been created, however, a freelance web designer is needed to help with website development and maintenance. 

And finally, the "really big dream" is a Full Functioning Wellness Center.  Yes!  A place where an individual can come and learn how to change up their lifestyle to support a healthier way of living by awakening and supporting a full, mind, body, spirit, wellness approach.  The Vita Cucina Nutraceutical Kitchen  would be expanded into a teaching facility helping people learn how to cook nourishing foods, easily.  This wellness center would have individual healing "yurts" where one can come, stay and be surrounded by the beauty of nature, take walks, meditate....heal.

 

The question that is frequently asked is, “What do I get for my donation”? Well, currently we don’t have the significant financial resources to create a ton of “Give-Away” items. These items are expensive to create. The Arsenceic Foundation wants all of the money to go into research, no perks or frills.   That being said...we have decided that for larger donations we are going to offer a T-shirt that reflects the theme of the campaign and will be featured in the "perks" section here.

But the BIGGEST gift is the knowledge that you are helping a small group of fanatically passionate visionaries who can imagine a world where all wellness is achieved with food! “That” is what you get for your donation. Like Thomas Edison once said, “The Doctors of the future will give no medicine but instead care for the human frame with diet and in the cause and prevention of disease”. We are expanding on the vision of people like Einstein, Edison, Tesla and even Hippocrates himself!  

 

 … Besides, do you really need another cheap pen or t-shirt that will serve as your next car towel?  Ummmm … we didn’t think so!

 

So to wrap it all up.  Every single one of us has a vested interest in healthcare.  None of us is immune to dis-ease, chronic health conditions or an overall lack of wellness.  We are surrounded by some very humbling statistics that seem to worsen every ... single ... day. 

This year alone, 15,270 children will be diagnosed with cancer and 1,790 will die.

There will be 1,685,210 new cancer diagnosis and 595,690 overall deaths.

Breast cancer is being found in younger and younger women and this year there will be 316,120 women diagnosed with new cases of breast cancer. 

Colon cancer is at an all time high with 95,520 new cases in 2017 and it is striking younger people more than ever before.

These are just a few examples of the serious breakdown of our wellness as a society.

If you, a loved one, or someone you know is suffering from a life threatening or chronic condition, we at the Arsenceic Foundation really need your help so that we may find better ways of  addressing these health concerns. We're all in this together....so won't you please give us a hand?

 

PLEASE HELP US OUT!

And, last but not least....we know that today it seems everyone is "in your pocket".  Everyone seems to have  a "pitch" for one thing or another, but we really are onto something important here and we need your help to get to the next level.  Please, give us what you can, heck, this year American's spent $440 million on Halloween Costumes for Fido so surely you can dig into your pocket for this most noble cause! Give until it hurts.  Furthermore, for those of you who give a minimum of $250.00,  you will become part of the Arsenceic Foundation's "Helping Hands" circle of donors and your name will be highlighted in all of our social media campaigns. 

Additionally, please help to spread the word of this extremely important message.  We would ask that you send a link to this site to at least 10 of your friends....and send it directly to them, not just a blanket message and ask them in turn to do the same.  With this extra reach we can increase our donation base significantly and get closer to our ultimate goal, to help people and become the positive change we hope to see in the World.  

Many hands make for light work. Become a "helping hand".
story_txt:
Short Summary
As stated in the video we, The Arsenceic Foundation, along with the Critical One Laboratory, have already made significant and vital advances in the fight against cancer and many other life- threatening and debilitating conditions.  With Critical One's PROPRIETARY HYBRIDIZED ADIABATIC FULL SPECTRUM BIOMATRIX EXTRACTION PROCEDURE AND CLINICAL PROTOCOL, we are here to TURN THIS BOAT AROUND!  We are sick and tired of seeing people "sick and tired" and we have developed some amazing ideas to fix this broken healthcare system.
 

 
 
Who are we and how can we do this?

 
Lisa-marie, the director of the Arsenceic Foundation, got tired of feeling empty and unfulfilled after years with several Fortune 500 companies so she left her 401K behind to hold the hands of those who are struggling to survive life- threatening illnesses.  Her years of experience in the corporate world, along with her innate knowledge of botany combined with an obsession of cooking, has enabled her to establish a non-profit foundation dedicated to funding the invention of a line of delicious and nutritious recipes using healing herbs, spices and phytonutrient profiles to aid in natural healing.

As a trained post-graduate Neurobiologist, Marco, the director of research at Critical One Laboratory and the Nutraceutical kitchen, Vita Cucina, has an approach to plant-based extraction protocols, procedures and therapies that are truly unique.  A born researcher, and true Renaissance Man, Marco has sold the shirt off his back to fund a laboratory that is creating groundbreaking, full spectrum biomatrix Nutraceuticals through a proprietary hybridized adiabatic, full spectrum biomatrix extraction procedure and clinical protocols that are changing the way we fight dis-ease and creating healing results that are unparalleled.
With Lisa-marie's business acumen and Marco's unique application of art and science, collectively they are anxious to usher in a new "brand of wellness."
 
Round One!!

This 1st  Fundraising Campaign is essential to the growth of Critical One's overall project and facility expansion.  Over the past several years Critical One Laboratory has been funded by the liquidation of personal assets which has provided them with the capital to develop this very important research and proprietary extraction processes and clinical Nutraceutical protocols.   Now, The Arsenceic Foundation, in keeping with its mission statement, has repositioned it's efforts to assist in the funding of this eminent work. It is with your generous donations that The Arsenceic Foundation will be able to continue to assist Critical One with future funding of clinical trials and additional equipment purchases.
 

So check this out....we can make this super simple for you AND improve YOUR health at the same time.    If you were to give up 3 Venti Pumpkin Spice Latte's a week for 2 months you could save yourself 11,280 calories, 1,488 grams of sugar and 360 grams of fat AND you could hand over $126.00 to us so that we can put it to use saving lives.  So...not only are you taking care of your health, but you are helping to purchase equipment that could literally save a life and perhaps...many!   
(And make sure to look very closely at this photo....it will seriously freak you out!)

 
The Critical One Laboratory has already seen tremendous results with its proprietary hybridized adiabatic extraction process and clinical Nutraceutical protocols.  The full spectrum biomatrix extracts have shown increased biovailability and intercellular residency by enhancing secondary and tertiary metabolites unique to this groundbreaking extraction process. Along with Vita Cucina Nutraceutical Kitchen and Production Facility, they're ready to take this to the next level. They desperately need your support to purchase the additional analytical equipment, production equipment, expanded Ultra-Organic Grow facilities and additional personnel. 
This funding is vitally important for all of those who have been dropped by the mainstream medical community and who are struggling with a health issue.  We all deserve to have access to “healthy alternatives to wellness”.  Help us, help you and others!!  Good health isn’t a corporately granted privilege … it’s a birthright!
So what do you say?  Many hands make for light work and The Critical One Laboratory needs your contribution so that they can continue their formal Nutraceutical research into processes, procedures and protocols to determine efficacy, potency and assurance.  With the Holidays upon us there is no better way to show your love for others than making a donation in their name.  Please donate to the Arsenceic Foundation generously. 

 
 

What We Need & What You Get
If the Arsenceic Foundation is able to raise all of the badly needed funding, The Critical One Laboratory has an ultimate “wish list”.    However,  in the event that only some of the money is raised, there is a multi-phase plan that will enable Critical One to move forward with the “most pressing items”, putting out the proverbial “fires” in order of importance.
There are some initial "must haves" for the laboratory that are very expensive, but will help with further research and enable the scientists to be more time efficient.  Testing equipment and additional extraction equipment along with scalable production equipment are just a small part of the requisite aparatus required for expansion.
For the Vita Cucina Industrial kitchen and production facility, much of the equipment has already been purchased but as the product line grows, there is a need to increase the scope of the facility.  Additional refrigeration, warmers, blenders and juicers are among some of the additional items required.  In order for the Critical One Laboratory to take the next step forward, acquiring a High Powered Liquid Chromatography or HPLC is mandatory.....this particular piece of equipment is essential when challenging the pharmaceutical industry and showing the nutracokinetic efficacy of this important work. 

Along with additional part time administrative personnel, a full time analytical chemist is a necessary addition to our existing research staff. A fully functioning proprietary website, full of helpful information, articles, recipes and protocols, easily accessed in a library format is also key to truly helping people with life threatening and chronic health conditions.  There is a wonderful Facebook community, numbering in the thousands, that has already been created, however, a freelance web designer is needed to help with website development and maintenance. 

And finally, the "really big dream" is a Full Functioning Wellness Center.  Yes!  A place where an individual can come and learn how to change up their lifestyle to support a healthier way of living by awakening and supporting a full, mind, body, spirit, wellness approach.  The Vita Cucina Nutraceutical Kitchen  would be expanded into a teaching facility helping people learn how to cook nourishing foods, easily.  This wellness center would have individual healing "yurts" where one can come, stay and be surrounded by the beauty of nature, take walks, meditate....heal.

 
The question that is frequently asked is, “What do I get for my donation”? Well, currently we don’t have the significant financial resources to create a ton of “Give-Away” items. These items are expensive to create. The Arsenceic Foundation wants all of the money to go into research, no perks or frills.   That being said...we have decided that for larger donations we are going to offer a T-shirt that reflects the theme of the campaign and will be featured in the "perks" section here.

But the BIGGEST gift is the knowledge that you are helping a small group of fanatically passionate visionaries who can imagine a world where all wellness is achieved with food! “That” is what you get for your donation. Like Thomas Edison once said, “The Doctors of the future will give no medicine but instead care for the human frame with diet and in the cause and prevention of disease”. We are expanding on the vision of people like Einstein, Edison, Tesla and even Hippocrates himself!  
 
 … Besides, do you really need another cheap pen or t-shirt that will serve as your next car towel?  Ummmm … we didn’t think so!
 
So to wrap it all up.  Every single one of us has a vested interest in healthcare.  None of us is immune to dis-ease, chronic health conditions or an overall lack of wellness.  We are surrounded by some very humbling statistics that seem to worsen every ... single ... day. 
This year alone, 15,270 children will be diagnosed with cancer and 1,790 will die.
There will be 1,685,210 new cancer diagnosis and 595,690 overall deaths.

Breast cancer is being found in younger and younger women and this year there will be 316,120 women diagnosed with new cases of breast cancer. 
Colon cancer is at an all time high with 95,520 new cases in 2017 and it is striking younger people more than ever before.
These are just a few examples of the serious breakdown of our wellness as a society.
If you, a loved one, or someone you know is suffering from a life threatening or chronic condition, we at the Arsenceic Foundation really need your help so that we may find better ways of  addressing these health concerns. We're all in this together....so won't you please give us a hand?

 
PLEASE HELP US OUT!
And, last but not least....we know that today it seems everyone is "in your pocket".  Everyone seems to have  a "pitch" for one thing or another, but we really are onto something important here and we need your help to get to the next level.  Please, give us what you can, heck, this year American's spent $440 million on Halloween Costumes for Fido so surely you can dig into your pocket for this most noble cause! Give until it hurts.  Furthermore, for those of you who give a minimum of $250.00,  you will become part of the Arsenceic Foundation's "Helping Hands" circle of donors and your name will be highlighted in all of our social media campaigns. 
Additionally, please help to spread the word of this extremely important message.  We would ask that you send a link to this site to at least 10 of your friends....and send it directly to them, not just a blanket message and ask them in turn to do the same.  With this extra reach we can increase our donation base significantly and get closer to our ultimate goal, to help people and become the positive change we hope to see in the World.  
Many hands make for light work. Become a "helping hand".

story:
Bouger et Vivre est un organisme a but non-lucratif qui vise à améliorer la qualité de vie de personnes âgées ou présentant des problèmes de mobilité ou autre besoins spécifiques. Pour se faire, Bouger et Vivre a ouvert un centre de conditionnement physique destiné à toutes les clientèles! Cette salle se trouve au centre Marcel-Giroux de Verdun et est actuellement ouverte 3 jours par semaine. Les membres peuvent venir s’y entraîner selon leur horaire, et ont recours à l’expertise d’un kinésiologue qui leur offre un programme d’entraînement. La nécessité d’avoir un kinésiologue, un spécialiste en activité physique, se ressent à chaque session d’entraînement, soit pour encourager les membres, apporter de l’information sur les bonnes techniques, etc. Cet encadrement permet aux membres de réaliser qu’il est possible de s’entraîner malgré les limitations physiques survenues au cours de leur vie.

Puisque la mission de Bouger et Vivre et d’être accessible à tous, nous travaillons pour que les frais de notre gym soient accessibles à tous. C’est pour cette raison que nous nous tournons vers vous pour financer en grande partie le salaire de notre personnel pour l’année 2018. En effet, chaque 400$ que nous recevons nous permet de rester ouvert une semaine de plus! 

Vos fonds monétaires sont donc de la plus grande importance pour la survie de notre organisme et nous espérons avoir votre support. Nous avons même quelques récompenses pour nos donateurs!

Pour plus d’informations, visiter notre site internet au http://bougervivre.weebly.com ou suivez-nous sur Facebook @BougerEtVivre.

Merci pour votre temps,

Monique Trudel
Fondatrice et présidente du conseil d’administration
Bouger et Vivre

*****

Bouger et Vivre is a non-profit organisation created in hopes of bringing physical activity to everyone, and improving the quality of life of those with limited mobility and the aging population. In order to do so, this organisation operates a fitness center three days a week in a room of Verdun’s Marcel-Giroux community center. Members of our gym are welcome to workout at any time of the day, and are greeted by a kinesiologist, who offers them a training plan. Having a kinesiologist, an expert in physical activity, is part of Bouger et Vivre’s mandate to provide safe and high quality services to its members. The kinesiologist thus demonstrates proper movements, encourages those coming to workout, and teaches members how to move despite congenital or acquired physical limitations.

Since accessibility is at the core of Bouger et Vivre’s mandate, it is impossible for us to require members to buy expensive memberships. Therefore, we are asking for your help so we can stay open in 2018 and pay our kinesiologist on staff for the next year. 

Your donations are of the utmost importance to us, and we hope to have your support. Be sure to check out the rewards to our donors!

For more information, you can check out our website at http://bougervivre.weebly.com (french only so far) or come visit our Facebook page @BougerEtVivre.

Thank you for your consideration,

Monique Trudel
Founder and president of the board
Bouger et Vivre

story:
The First Audio Bible in Macedonian Language is a project of Christian non-profit Production in Macedonia named IMPACT Production.  We want to invite you to partner with us in this project. Help us to produce this historically  important project as the first Audio Bible in Macedonian. You can partner with us with your generous donations, and help to the blind and visually impaired, but also for everyone on the go, who constantly has their smartphone in hand and earphones on. 

Macedonia is the first country in Europe that received the Gospel. It was the gateway for the Gospel to the Western World. St.Cyril and Methodius were the apostles to the Slavic nations and created the Cyrillic alphabet so that they could give the Word of God to millions of people. But even though we have such rich Christian heritage, we still don't have an audio Bible in Macedonian, and we still lack a lot of modern tools for sharing the Gospel. An audio Bible is not just necessary for the blind and visually impaired, but also for everyone on the go, who constantly has their smartphone in hand and earphones on. 

 The amount we are raising for the readers and the studio editing is just one third from the actual amount. This is due to the fact that we're going step by step, part by part. When we're done recording we will have more than 80hrs of finished material, but that takes 400 days of work. Every book of the Bible will have it's own music theme. The audio Bible will be a light in the darkness for the blind, for those who aren't used to reading, and especially for Muslims who otherwise would not attend a public preaching of the Gospel.

We want to give free an Audio Bible in Macedonian to every blind person in Macedonia.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support us financially, you can still support us by sharing this campaign with your network and friends. 

Thank you in advance
Temelko Andreev, President of IMPACT Production
